tool_description: Generates detailed finishing schedule with surface preparation, application steps, drying times, and environmental requirements.

finish_type.description: Type of finish: oil, polyurethane, lacquer, shellac, paint, or wax

humidity_level.description: Workshop humidity: low, normal, or high

usage: Specify wood species, finish type, surface area, and application preferences. Include environmental conditions for accurate timing calculations.
